response.original_title: Curso Practico de Dibujo y Pintura
response.overview: This DVD is a Practical Course in Drawing and Painting in two parts.  DVD (Parte 1):  First strokes: Charcoal / Oil.  DVD (Parte 2):  1. Technical Various - The First Pastel Testing;  2. Drawing - Lace, Composition and Frame;  3. Watercolor - Tonal Gradient Sky.
response.title: Practical Course in Drawing and Painting
